TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BitmapMetadata extends System.Windows.Media.ImageMetadata implements class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<string>, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public Class BitmapMetadata Inherits ImageMetadata Implements IEnumerable(Of String)
type BitmapMetadata = class inherit ImageMetadata interface seq<string> interface IEnumerable
type BitmapMetadata = class inherit ImageMetadata interface IEnumerable interface seq<string>

summary.span: 提供对从位图图像中读取元数据以及将元数据写入位图图像的支持。

span.span: Provides support for reading and writing metadata to and from a bitmap image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与图像关联的元数据是描述图像但不需要显示图像的数据。Metadata that is associated with an image is data that describes the image but is not necessary to display the image. 每个支持的位图图像格式处理元数据的方式不同，但用于读取和写入元数据的设备是相同的。Each supported bitmap image format handles metadata differently, but the facility for reading and writing metadata is the same. Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 支持以下图像元数据架构：可交换 image file (Exif) 、文本 (PNG 文本数据) 、image file directory (IFD) 、国际新闻电信委员会 (IPTC) 和可扩展元数据平台 (XMP) 。Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) supports the following image metadata schemas: Exchangeable image file (Exif), tEXt (PNG Textual Data), image file directory (IFD), International Press Telecommunications Council (IPTC), and Extensible Metadata Platform (XMP). 如果由 使用获取的公开 ，则默认情况下它是只读的，并且可变操作将引发异常。If a is exposed by a that is obtained by using a , it is read-only by default and mutable operations will throw an exception. 如果它由 包装另一个的，则 它在构造时是可变的。If it is exposed by a that wraps another , it is mutable on construction. 和 方法可用于构造和读取元数据查询。The and methods can be used to construct and read metadata queries. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 IFD 和 Exif 架构，将元数据写入标记图像文件格式 (TIFF) 映像。The following example demonstrates how to write metadata to a Tagged Image File Format (TIFF) image by using the IFD and Exif schemas. [!code-csharp[BitmapFrameExample#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitmapFrameExample/CSharp/BitmapFrame.cs#7)] [!code-vb[BitmapFrameExample#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitmapFrameExample/VB/BitmapFrame.vb#7)]

related.span: 可移植网络图形文本数据 (文本) 规范

span.span: Portable Network Graphics Textual Data (tEXt) Specification

related.span: 国际新闻电信委员会 (IPTC) 架构信息

span.span: International Press Telecommunications Council (IPTC) Schema Information

related.span: Adobe 可扩展元数据平台 (XMP)

span.span: Adobe Extensible Metadata Platform (XMP)

related.span: EXIF (可交换图像文件格式) 规范

span.span: EXIF (Exchangeable Image File Format) Specification

summary.span: 创建此 的可修改克隆，从而深度复制此对象的值。

span.span: Creates a modifiable clone of this , making deep copies of this object's values.

returns.span: 当前对象的可修改复本。

span.span: A modifiable clone of the current object.

returns.span: 即使源的 属性为 ，所克隆对象的 属性也为 。

span.span: The cloned object's property is even if the source's property is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于生成冻结 对象 (或任何对象) 的可修改副本 。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 为方便起见，此方法会隐藏继承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

Protected Overrides Sub CloneCore (sourceFreezable As Freezable)

span.span: The to clone.

summary.span: 使此实例成为指定 的深层副本。

span.span: Makes this instance a deep copy of the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由方法调用， 不应在代码中直接调用，除非在重写此方法时调用基实现。This method is called by the method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method. 若要创建当前对象的可修改副本，请调用， 而不是直接调用此方法。To create a modifiable copy of the current object, call instead of calling this method directly. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与图像关联的元数据是描述图像但不需要用于显示图像的数据。Metadata that is associated with an image is data that describes the image but that is not necessary for display of the image. 每个支持的位图图像格式处理元数据的方式不同，但用于读取和写入元数据的设备是相同的。Each supported bitmap image format handles metadata differently, but the facility for reading and writing metadata is the same. Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 支持以下图像元数据架构：可交换 image file (Exif) 、文本 (PNG 文本数据) 、image file directory (IFD) 、国际新闻电信委员会 (IPTC) 和可扩展元数据平台 (XMP) 。Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) supports the following image metadata schemas: Exchangeable image file (Exif), tEXt (PNG Textual Data), image file directory (IFD), International Press Telecommunications Council (IPTC), and Extensible Metadata Platform (XMP). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法将 元数据写入到可移植网络图形 (PNG) 文件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to write metadata to a Portable Network Graphics (PNG) file. [!code-cpp[bitmapmetadata#SetQuery](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitMapMetadata/CPP/BitmapMetadata.cpp#setquery)] [!code-csharp[bitmapmetadata#SetQuery](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitMapMetadata/CSharp/BitmapMetadata.cs#setquery)] [!code-vb[bitmapmetadata#SetQuery](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitMapMetadata/VB/BitmapMetadata.vb#setquery)] 写入元数据后， 使用方法读取该数据并将其作为文本字符串发出。After the metadata is written, the method is used to read that data and emit it as a text string. remarks.format: ## Remarks 与图像关联的元数据是描述图像但不需要用于显示图像的数据。Metadata that is associated with an image is data that describes the image but that is not necessary for display of the image. 每个支持的位图图像格式处理元数据的方式不同，但用于读取和写入元数据的设备是相同的。Each supported bitmap image format handles metadata differently, but the facility for reading and writing metadata is the same. Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 支持以下图像元数据架构：可交换 image file (Exif) 、文本 (PNG 文本数据) 、image file directory (IFD) 、国际新闻电信委员会 (IPTC) 和可扩展元数据平台 (XMP) 。Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) supports the following image metadata schemas: Exchangeable image file (Exif), tEXt (PNG Textual Data), image file directory (IFD), International Press Telecommunications Council (IPTC), and Extensible Metadata Platform (XMP).

span.span: is .

exception.span: 当图像元数据为只读时发生。

span.span: Occurs when image metadata is read-only.

span.span: Provides access to a metadata query writer that can write metadata to a bitmap image file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与图像关联的元数据是描述图像但不需要用于显示图像的数据。Metadata that is associated with an image is data that describes the image but that is not necessary for display of the image. 每个支持的位图图像格式处理元数据的方式不同，但用于读取和写入元数据的设备是相同的。Each supported bitmap image format handles metadata differently, but the facility for reading and writing metadata is the same. Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 支持以下图像元数据架构：可交换 image file (Exif) 、文本 (PNG 文本数据) 、image file directory (IFD) 、国际新闻电信委员会 (IPTC) 和可扩展元数据平台 (XMP) 。Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) supports the following image metadata schemas: Exchangeable image file (Exif), tEXt (PNG Textual Data), image file directory (IFD), International Press Telecommunications Council (IPTC), and Extensible Metadata Platform (XMP). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法将 元数据写入到可移植网络图形 (PNG) 文件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to write metadata to a Portable Network Graphics (PNG) file. [!code-cpp[bitmapmetadata#SetQuery](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitMapMetadata/CPP/BitmapMetadata.cpp#setquery)] [!code-csharp[bitmapmetadata#SetQuery](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitMapMetadata/CSharp/BitmapMetadata.cs#setquery)] [!code-vb[bitmapmetadata#SetQuery](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitMapMetadata/VB/BitmapMetadata.vb#setquery)] 写入元数据后， 使用方法读取该数据并将其作为文本字符串发出。After the metadata is written, the method is used to read that data and emit it as a text string. [!code-cpp[bitmapmetadata#GetQuery](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitMapMetadata/CPP/BitmapMetadata.cpp#getquery)] [!code-csharp[bitmapmetadata#GetQuery](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitMapMetadata/CSharp/BitmapMetadata.cs#getquery)] [!code-vb[bitmapmetadata#GetQuery](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitMapMetadata/VB/BitmapMetadata.vb#getquery)]
